00030 /**
00031  * @see Bee_Exception
00032  */
00033 require_once 'Bee/Exception.php';
00034 
00035 /**
00036  * Abstract SQL database adapter class.
00037  *
00038  * @category   Colony
00039  * @package    Bee
00040  * @copyright  Copyright (c) Army of Bees (www.armyofbees.com)
00041  * @license    http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT License
00042  */
00043 abstract class Bee_Db_Abstract
00044 {
00045     /**
00046      * The configuration to connect to the database
00047      * @var array
00048      */
00049         protected $_config = array();
00050         
00051     /**
00052      * Database connection
00053      * @var resource
00054      */
00055     protected $_connection = null;
00056 
00057     /**
00058      * Query resource ID
00059      * @var resource
00060      */
00061         protected $_queryid = null;
00062         
00063     /**
00064      * The contents of the last query
00065      * @var string
00066      */
00067         public $query = "";
00068         
00069     /**
00070      * The count of queries so far
00071      * @var integer
00072      */
00073         public $querycount = 0;
00074 
00075     /**
00076      * An array of times each query took to process
00077      * @var array
00078      */
00079         public $querytimes = array();
00080         
00081     /**
00082      * An array of previous queries processed by the database
00083      * @var array
00084      */
00085         public $querylist = array();
00086 
00087         /**
00088          * Constructor for the class. Just sets some values for other functions.
00089          *
00090          * @param array $config The configuration to use for connection
00091          */
00092         public function __construct( $config = array() )
00093         {
00094         // Verify that configuration is in an array.
00095         if( !is_array( $config ) )
00096             throw new Bee_Db_Exception('Configuration must be in an array');
00097         
00098                 $this->config = $config;
00099         }
00100         
00101         /**
00102          * Queries the database. Runs through the sub-class's _query() function.
00103          *
00104          * @param string $query_string The query string to run
00105          * @param boolean $no_debug Tells the function if it should record the query in the debug variables.
00106          */
00107         public function query( $query_string, $no_debug = false )
00108         {
00109         // Do not error out, but don't process an empty query.
00110         if( $query_string == '' )
00111                         return;
00112 
00113                 $this->connect();
00114                 
00115                 if( !$no_debug )
00116                 {
00117             $mtime = microtime();
00118             $mtime = explode( ' ', $mtime );
00119             $querystarttime = $mtime[1] + $mtime[0];
00120                 }
00121                 
00122                 $this->_query( $query_string, $no_debug );
00123         $this->querycount++;
00124                         
00125                 if( !$no_debug )
00126                 {
00127                         $mtime = microtime();
00128                         $mtime = explode( ' ', $mtime );
00129                         $queryendtime = $mtime[1] + $mtime[0];
00130 
00131             $this->querytimes[] = $queryendtime - $querystarttime;
00132             $this->querylist[]  = $query_string;
00133         }
00134 
00135         return $this->_queryid;
00136         }
00137 }
00138 
00139 class Bee_Db_Abstract_Exception extends Bee_Exception
00140 {}
